notesStmt.note: Shelomoh ben Avraham, Shelomoh Supino, Shelomoh ben Yitsḥaḳ and Ya῾aḳov ben Mosheh: inscribed, folio 134v.Folios 134v-135r contain doodles.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The revised recension of Maimonides' Sefer mitsṿot in the Hebrew translation of Solomon ben Joseph ibn ῾Ayyub.

collation.p: 14 quires: i-xiii10 (folio 1-129), xiv5 (folios 130-134). The first leaf of the first quire has been cancelled. Catchwords at the end of the quires, partly cut away.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian semi-cursive script of the 15th century.
